website_summaries.verdict: A compact pressure washer perfect for weekend or occasional use.
pros: Easy to set up, use, and maneuver
Powerful enough for a variety of outdoor cleaning jobs
Easy Start technology for hassle-free use
cons: Doesn't pack quite as much power as other gas pressure washers

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to try this out today, engine started right up got pressure going and bam it did better then I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Used this once last year, went to use again ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this once last year, went to use again this year and won't start. Brought the extra warranty, what a JOKE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Christmas Gift , just used it for the first time and it loses pressure as you used it . Very disappointed in the product . I am not sure if it’s a defective unit or poor quality product . It’s outside the return window so I am stuck with it .I completely wasted my money on it .
customer_reviews.author: Sherri  L.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t start after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I used this twice when I first bought it last February and put it up. I put stabilizer in the fuel before putting it up but went to use it a couple weeks ago and it wouldn’t start. I changed the oil and swapped out the fuel and nothing. Went to clean the carburetor and it’s plastic and sealed (junk). Hit it with some gumout as best I could. Got it fired up and it died again and still won’t turn over. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Mychal Hunter

customer_reviews.title: bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: i was only able to use this item once for about 3 hours when i first got it. Tried to use it for the 2nd time today, can't get the thing to start, not happy with this product at all
customer_reviews.author: scooterrpb

customer_reviews.title: nice weight, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I buy power tools and gadgets all day long. This thing is well built, nice weight, easy to set up, and most importantly to me, cranks right up and does the job everytime
customer_reviews.author: frankforney

customer_reviews.title: Great long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great power washer that I've had for nearly 3 years. This gets light use around my home, and I've used it at my parents and grandparents houses. I've loaned it to friends and family. It cleans patios and siding (vinyl and aluminum). Its cleaned my deck several times. If used correctly, this should be a long lasting power washer for you. Best way to ensure your power washer pump lasts is to ensure you get water to the pump before you start the engine.
customer_reviews.author: JR Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great, plenty of power and light enough to lift onto truck alone.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, plenty of power and light enough for one person to lift onto truck alone.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Dunaj

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: Ran great, put stabilizer in it for the winter and it never worked again. Have torn the whole thing down and still can't get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got a good deal on this and it works great it was easy to put together and easy to start and I'm just a girl
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: inadequate
customer_reviews.text: the performance was adequate. it was delivered with the pack of oil all over the box and unit. the push pins to hold the tool assembly was very inadequate....would not stay in place: keep pulling out. It over heated too and thus shoot down. For the money, quit inadequate.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Easy to start and plenty of pressured to ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Easy to start and plenty of pressured to pressure wash houses and decks. It's also light weight which is a great benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and easy to maneuver. I did a lot of research on pressure washers and very pleased I selected this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only worked once.
customer_reviews.text: Pressure washed my driveway once. Next season wouldn't start, and I am darned handy.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu57

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, works great. Just wish i had gotten at least 3000 psi for cleaning my driveway
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Bought new—with 3rd market parts
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a pressure washer pump that wasn’t designed for this machine. I’m not sure why but it no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Mommypants

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work and support doesn’t answer
customer_reviews.text: Garbage is all I have to say. Over 1000 items purchased on Amazon and this worked when i got it and this is the second time trying to use it and will not start. Called support line and waited and waited and waited. ...... I would still be waiting. waste of money. total loss. it sucks!
customer_reviews.author: tech savvy

customer_reviews.text: Like how much power this has. Only downside is how hot the engine gets while running. I burned a hole through the hose because it payed on the engine for like 5 seconds. So just be aware of the hose whenever operating
customer_reviews.author: Jmac

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Only got to use this machine a hand full of times, before the pressure thingy broke on it. Just sits in the shed taking up space.. Will cost $100 to replace the part for it
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Power and reliability
customer_reviews.text: Next time I would want one with a detergent tank instead of just the hose that hangs underneath
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hendricks Sr

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The item works ok excuit is missing parts there is no basket to hold the cleaning solution no holder for the starter rope and it’s missing the oil cap.
customer_reviews.author: PoeticDreamer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to clean my siding, sidewalks, and deck thanks to this item. Follow the instructions closely and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great power leaks oil
customer_reviews.text: The power washer starts easily does the job well however, it is already leaking oil after the second time of using it. So disappointed we have it the shop already
customer_reviews.author: Pamela conner

customer_reviews.title: Nice pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten to use it much, but the few times i have, it works great
customer_reviews.author: Donna williams

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Worked once for me and now will not start. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Nothing really I know all
customer_reviews.text: I get it I start at one time it starts right away and then I waited a couple days to wash my car and it don’t start thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Dibetta

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This is an overall good machine bought it to run a sewer better and has met my expectations and gets the job done for residential use
customer_reviews.author: AaronSturgil

customer_reviews.title: Great product but comes with a cheap hose
customer_reviews.text: Works great, filled with oil and gas and it cranked up on second pull. Cleaned the concrete on my driveway without any issues. Edit** After two uses i noticed the hose started bubbling, so i took a star off for poor quality. Other than that, it is still working well after replacing the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Nonamehere

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: STILL LEARNING HOW TO USE IT BUT I THINK IT WILL BE GREAT
customer_reviews.author: lt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: water outlet directly behind the tire. Had to buy a flex hose to get around tire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well. We use it for everything from ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. We use it for everything from washing our vehicles to washing our house. Makes cleaning outside so much easier. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT Start reliably
customer_reviews.text: How do I exchange this new 2nd pressure washer since it won't start. 1st machine was exchanged because it would not start
customer_reviews.author: Garth DG

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the fact that you must hold down the trigger ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact that you must hold down the trigger the entire time you use it - my hands can't take it. There needs to be some kind of trigger lock that holds it down for you.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dawe

product_meta.title: Briggs & Stratton S2200 2200 MAX PSI at 1.9 GPM Gas Pressure Washer with Easy Start Technology, 25-Foot High-Pressure Hose, and 3 Quick-Connect Nozzles
product_meta.description:
Clean your walkways, patio furniture and car faster and easier than you could with a garden hose alone. This Briggs & Stratton 2200 Max PSI pressure washer features a powerful, yet lightweight, Briggs & Stratton 550e Series engine. Combine that power with the heavy-duty axial cam pump with Easy Start technology, 10-inch never-go-flat wheels and a detergent siphon system, and you can quickly overpower whatever projects come your way. This unit is certified by the Pressure Washer Manufacturers' Association (PWMA). All water pressure (PSI) and flow rate (GPM) claims for this product were tested and verified by an independent lab, ensuring you take home the power you were promised.
With more than 100 years of experience, Briggs & Stratton is trusted by millions of people around the globe and backed by the largest network services in the industry. We are the world's largest small engine producer, the number one marketer for pressure washers, and a leading manufacturer of power generation, lawn and garden turf care and job site products.
feature_bullets: Fuel every project with plenty of reliable Briggs & Stratton power from the 550e Series OHV Engine
Maintenance-Free axial cam pump with Easy Start technology provides easy, low-effort starting
Easily attach any of the 3 quick-connect tips (0°, 25°, soap) to the steel spray wand to tackle a variety of cleaning tasks
Reach higher with your cleaning potential, with 25 feet of hose that's built to endure hard work and high pressure
Upgrade your power washing in seconds by simply siphoning cleaning solution into the water stream
All water pressure (PSI) & flow rate (GPM) claims were tested & verified by an independent lab, ensuring you take home the power you were promised
Use for washing cars, driveways and other small to medium projects
550e Series 140cc Engine to power through your weekend projects
Detergent injection system infuses cleaning solution into the water stream for a faster, easier cleaning
50-pound assembled weight and never go flat wheels
Can not be shipped to the state of California
